metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4362 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
WEB-DAV Linux File System (davfs2) 1.4.6 and 1.4.7 allow local users to gain privileges via unknown attack vectors in (1) kernel_interface.c and (2) mount_davfs.c, related to the "system" function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4362` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

davfs2 - 1.5.2-1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: davfs2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-1.2').
